name: Ready, Aim, Marry Me! Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who spills their drink in the model home in the beginning of the episode?
questions.explanation:
Lucille.

	When Michael arrives at the model home, he finds Lucille inside and she is stressed because she thinks that Lucille 2 is planning to take control and revolutionize the Bluth Company.  When she tries making a point, she ends up spilling her drink and George Michael and Tobias slip on it after she leaves.

questions.text: Who does Michael give his Valentine's Day package to?
questions.explanation:
Tobias.

	When Tobias accidentally tests his gift from the charity auction, he realizes that he wasted it rather than spend it with Lindsay.  Michael ends up giving him the gift since he can't use it with Sally Sitwell.  He also tells Tobias that he will ask Lindsay for him, and Tobias is happy with Michael's generosity.  Lindsay on the other hand doesn't want to go with Tobias.

questions.text: Who calls Lucille 2's apartment when Gob picks up the phone?
questions.explanation:
Stan Sitwell.

	Michael, Gob, and Lindsay begin to think that Sitwell and Lucille 2 are planning a huge business deal involving the Bluth Company since she owns the majority of the Bluth Company's shares.  Actually, Stan Sitwell called because he is attracted to Lucille 2, but he hung up the phone because Gob picked it up.  Gob and Michael make Lindsay go to Sitwell Enterprises to investigate.

questions.text: What does George Sr. lose under the furnace in the attic?
questions.explanation:
A sourball.

	When George Sr. loses the sourball from his pocket, he goes to retrieve it and gets wedged into a tight space.  He ends up making his howling noise to alert Michael, and finally he comes up and they discuss the Sitwell problem.  George Sr. tells Michael to call in Jack Dorso.

questions.text: Is Jack Dorso really George Sr.'s uncle?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Jack Dorso was really an old friend of his father.  Jack rose to fame in the forties when he starred in a radio show about two men who fought Nazis.  When his co-star was sent to jail for his communist ways, Jack started a chain of gymnasiums.  On his seventieth birthday, Jack lost the use of his lower body when he tried to lift five pounds of weight for each year he was alive, and three-hundred and fifty pounds of weight crushed his legs.

questions.text: What is the name of Jack's carrier?
questions.explanation:
Dragon.

	Rather than push himself around in a wheelchair, Uncle Jack hired a big guy to carry him around everywhere.  Although Uncle Jack is extremely repulsive, Lindsay finds Dragon attractive and assumes that they're flirting even though he can't speak English.  Uncle Jack says that most people won't even let him into their homes, and it's easy to see why.

questions.text: Who does Michael set Jack up with for Valentine's Day?
questions.explanation:
Lindsay.

	After talking about the business problems, Jack asks if it would be possible to go on a date with Lindsay.  Michael decides to set the two up to save the company and because Lindsay said she would do something for him.  Meanwhile, Buster tries to go back to Lucille 2.

questions.text: Who does Tobias go on his 'date' with?
questions.explanation:
Michael.

	Rather than disappoint Tobias by saying that Lindsay can't go, he decides to endure the day with him.  Unfortunately, Lindsay is right behind them with Dragon and Jack, and following them are Lucille 2 and Stan Sitwell.  Each group seems to have different problems which make the day a mess.  Meanwhile, Buster and Gob followed right behind Sitwell and Lucille to track them down.

questions.text: Does Tobias discover that Lindsay is spending time with two other men?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	After Buster and Gob arrive at the massage tents, they tell Michael and Tobias why they're following Lucille 2 and Sitwell, and they mention spotting Lindsay.  Tobias gets angry and tries to stop them, but Dragon throws Uncle Jack at Tobias.  Meanwhile, Buster finds out that Gob was with Lucille 2 and they begin fighting.

questions.text: Does Jack give Michael the money for the company?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	When Lucille 2 discovers all of the fighting, she decides that she now wants to sell the company.  Lindsay realizes that Tobias would fight for her and she explains that she knew she was really supposed to date Uncle Jack and she just wanted to help the company.
